name: Zombie Invaders 2
description:
The Zombies attacked again, but this time they pixelated most of the things! See if YOU can help destroy all the zombies, with the pixelated textures! This was made in Scratch!

I made it all by myself, and it took AGES. The title took like 30 minutes to make, and like 2 days of coding.

== INSTRUCTIONS ARE IN-GAME ==

I used Pixilart to make most of the textures.

For the background music, Free Background Music.

SFX, well, it came from YouTube, some SFX did not come from YouTube.

Anyway, have fun!
